definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Moving to Arizona cured her of her asthma .
sentences.chinese: 移居亞利桑納州治好了她的氣喘病。

sentences.english: Asthmatics have an increased susceptibility to viral illnesses .
sentences.chinese: 氣喘病人對病毒性病變的敏感性增加了。

sentences.english: I hae chronic asthma which is more than moderate in severity.
sentences.chinese: 我有慢性氣喘病，病情已超限度了。

sentences.english: She's got another attack of asthma .
Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae (Mhp) is the etiologic agent of mycoplasma pneumonia in swine.
sentences.chinese: 豬肺炎支原體是引起豬氣喘病的主要病原。

sentences.english: Your wheezing breathing suggests asthma or bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 你的哮喘顯示你可能患有氣喘病或支氣管炎。

sentences.english: Hematoma of the rectus sheath is a rare complication of asthma.
sentences.chinese: 腹直肌血腫是氣喘病的一種罕見的併發症。
